caption.p: Histopathology of brain tissue and the brain viral titre. A: HE staining and immunohistochemical staining of brain samples from normal mice. B: The brain of mice challenged with A/Zhejiang/DTID-ZJU01/2013(H7N9). The different degrees of injury at 2, 4, and 6 days after virus inoculation (original magnification, 200×). C: The H7 gene content in brain tissue. D: The TCID50 of the brain leachate. E: The brain of mice challenged with A/Guangdong/GZ8H002/2017(H7N9). The different degrees of injury at 2, 4, and 6 days after virus inoculation (200×). HE: Hematoxylin eosin staining; IHC: Immunohistochemical staining; dpi: days post infection.
